astride.translation[0].definitions[0].de: with one leg on each side of something
astride.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a photograph of my mother sitting astride a horse
astride.translation[0].definitions[1].de: on both sides of a river, road etc
astride.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The ancient town of Bridgwater, astride the River Parrett, is an ideal touring centre.
